@baseType.description: When sub-classing, this defines the super-class

@referredType.description: The actual type of the target instance when needed for disambiguation.

@schemaLocation.description: A URI to a JSON-Schema file that defines additional attributes and relationships

@type.description: When sub-classing, this defines the sub-class entity name

href.description: The reference link to the change request

id.description: The identifier of the change request
